JavaBeans specifying various LensKit objects.

    Base class for specification beans.

  • Exception Summary

Package org.lenskit.specs Description

JavaBeans specifying various LensKit objects.

The classes in this package (and related packages) describe various LensKit objects; they are primarily used to describe certain types of objects, such as data sources, without pulling in all of LensKit to do so; they are used to allow one process (such as the Gradle plugin) to set up objects that will be used by another process (e.g. a LensKit evaluator).

Note: Specifications are not expected to be compatible across LensKit versions. The specification API will maintain some API compatibility (exact amount TBD), but the serialized objects may change.

FIXME Specify the compatibility guarantees for specifications

See Also:
org.lenskit.specs.data
